org.treetank.service.jaxrx.util

Class WorkerHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.treetank.service.jaxrx.util.WorkerHelper

  • public final class WorkerHelper
extends Object
    This class contains methods that are respectively used by this worker classes (NodeIdRepresentation.java and DatabaseRepresentation.java)
    Author:
    Patrick Lang, Lukas Lewandowski, University of Konstanz

      • closeWTX

        public static void closeWTX(boolean abortTransaction,
            INodeWriteTrx wtx,
            ISession ses)
                     throws TTException
        This method closes all open treetank connections concerning a NodeWriteTrx.
        Parameters:
        abortTransaction - true if the transaction has to be aborted, false otherwise.
        wtx - INodeWriteTrx to be closed
        ses - ISession to be closed
        dbase - IStorage to be closed
        Throws:
        TreetankException
        TTException

      • closeRTX

        public static void closeRTX(INodeReadTrx rtx,
            ISession ses)
                     throws TTException
        This method closes all open treetank connections concerning a NodeReadTrx.
        Parameters:
        rtx - INodeReadTrx to be closed
        ses - ISession to be closed
        dbase - IStorage to be closed
        Throws:
        TTException

      • validateAccessType

        public EIdAccessType validateAccessType(String accessType)
        This method checks the variable URL path after the node id resource (e.g. http://.../factbook/3/[ACCESSTYPE]) for the available access type to identify a node. The access types are defined in EIdAccessType.
        Parameters:
        accessType - The access type as String value encoded in the URL request.
        Returns:
        The valid access type or null otherwise.

      • getInstance

        public static WorkerHelper getInstance()
        This method return the singleton instance.
        Returns:
        The single instance.
